author: James Van Straten, AI Boost
title: Semler Scientific Acquires Additional 185 Bitcoin, Bringing Holdings to Nearly $500M
description: The latest purchase was for $20 million and the company has now tapped its April 15 common stock issuance program for $136.2 million to fund bitcoin buys.
content:
Semler Scientific (SMLR) continues its bitcoin 
 acquisition strategy, purchasing 185 BTC for $20 million, or an average purchase price of $107,974 each, in the ten days ended June 3.This latest inv… [+604 chars]
